description.p: Reflect attacks aimed at you back at your enemy, but with double the power.

ul.li: When selecting this feat, pick either magical or physical attacks. Upon being hit by either a magical or melee attack, you can use your reaction to reflect double the damage onto the attacker. You regain the use of this ability after a long rest.

sheet.description: You can return either a magical or physical attack, at double the power, back at your enemy once per long rest.
